mapper.sql: ID, DISTRBUTOR_CODE, USER_CODE, OPERATOR_CODE, CHANNEL_TYPE, COOP_MODEL, COMPANY, BALANCE, FREEZING, TOTAL, SMS_CONTENT, STATE, LEVEL, CALLBACK_URL, CONFINING_IP, APP_KEY, SECRET_KEY
mapper.select:
select a.*, b.id as BUSER_ID, b.USER_CODE as BUSER_CODE from t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE
select a.*, b.* from t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE limit #{start} , #{pageSize}

select a.*, b.OPERATOR_NAME, c.PROVINCE_NAME, d.NAME from t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_base_operator b ON a.OPERATOR_CODE = b.ID INNER JOIN t_base_province c ON a.PROVINCE_CODE = c.ID INNER JOIN t_flow_provider d ON a.PROVIDER_CODE = d.PROVIDER_CODE where a.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_flow_distributor (ID, DISTRBUTOR_CODE, USER_CODE, OPERATOR_CODE, CHANNEL_TYPE, COOP_MODEL, COMPANY, BALANCE, FREEZING, TOTAL, SMS_CONTENT, STATE, LEVEL, CALLBACK_URL, CONFINING_IP, APP_KEY, SECRET_KEY) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distrbutorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coopModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{freezing,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{smsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confiningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_flow_distributor
ID,
DISTRBUTOR_CODE,
USER_CODE,
OPERATOR_CODE,
CHANNEL_TYPE,
COOP_MODEL,
COMPANY,
BALANCE,
FREEZING,
TOTAL,
SMS_CONTENT,
STATE,
LEVEL,
CALLBACK_URL,
CONFINING_IP,
APP_KEY,
SECRET_KEY,

mapper.update:
update t_flow_distributor
DISTRBUTOR_CODE = #{distrbutorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COOP_MODEL = #{coopModel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FREEZING = #{freezing,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SMS_CONTENT = #{smsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CALLBACK_URL = #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFINING_IP = #{confiningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_KEY = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECRET_KEY = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_flow_distributor set DISTRBUTOR_CODE = #{distrbutorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COOP_MODEL = #{coopModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FREEZING = #{freezing,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SMS_CONTENT = #{smsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CALLBACK_URL = #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFINING_IP = #{confiningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_KEY = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRET_KEY = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
